rules_text:
When False Liege of Luxury enters the battlefield, create two 3/2 black Snake creature tokens, then put a deathtouch counter on one and a lifelink counter on the other.
{1}{B}{G}, Discard False Liege of Luxury: Create a 3/2 black Snake creature token, then put a deathtouch counter or a lifelink counter on it. Activate only as a sorcery.
